00149 __STATIC_INLINE void VCMP_Enable(void)
00150 {
00151   VCMP->CTRL |= VCMP_CTRL_EN;
00152 }
00153 
00154 
00155 /***************************************************************************/
00159 __STATIC_INLINE void VCMP_Disable(void)
00160 {
00161   VCMP->CTRL &= ~VCMP_CTRL_EN;
00162 }

00165 /***************************************************************************/
00175 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t VCMP_VoltageToLevel(float v)
00176 {
00177   return (uint32_t)((v - (float)1.667) / (float)0.034);
00178 }

00181 /***************************************************************************/
00186 __STATIC_INLINE bool VCMP_VDDLower(void)
00187 {
00188   if (VCMP->STATUS & VCMP_STATUS_VCMPOUT)
00189   {
00190     return false;
00191   }
00192   else
00193   {
00194     return true;
00195   }
00196 }
00197 
00198 
00199 /***************************************************************************/
00204 __STATIC_INLINE bool VCMP_VDDHigher(void)

00207   {
00208     return true;
00209   }
00210   else
00211   {
00212     return false;
00213   }
00214 }

00221 __STATIC_INLINE bool VCMP_Ready(void)
00222 {
00223   if (VCMP->STATUS & VCMP_STATUS_VCMPACT)
00224   {
00225     return true;
00226   }
00227   else
00228   {
00229     return false;

00294 /***************************************************************************/
00305 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t VCMP_IntGet(void)
00306 {
00307   return VCMP->IF;
00308 }
00309 
00310 
00311 /***************************************************************************/
00329 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t VCMP_IntGetEnabled(void)
00330 {
00331   uint32_t tmp = 0U;
00332 
00333   /* Store VCMP->IEN in temporary variable in order to define explicit order
00334    * of volatile accesses. */
00335   tmp = VCMP->IEN;
00336 
00337   /* Bitwise AND of pending and enabled interrupts */
00338   return VCMP->IF & tmp;
00339 }
